title: GameChanger Crawler Output Schema
description: Output schema for arguments used to invoke GC crawler.

doc_title.title: Document Title
doc_title.description: Full document title - sometimes different from doc_name

doc_name.title: Document Name
doc_name.description: Document Name as derived from source context.

publication_date.title: Publication Date
publication_date.description: Date the publication was most recently published

original_publication_date.title: Publication Date
original_publication_date.description: Date the publication was originally published

cac_login_required.title: Restricted Document
cac_login_required.description: Access level of the document derived from context

crawler_used.title: Crawler Used
crawler_used.description: Name of the crawler the scraped the data

source_page_url.title: Source Page URL
source_page_url.description: URL at which the document links and other context was found.

version_hash_raw_data.title: The version_hash_raw_data schema
version_hash_raw_data.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

access_timestamp.title: The access_timestamp schema
access_timestamp.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

source_fqdn.title: Source FQDN
source_fqdn.description: Fully-qualified domain name of the website where document links were located.

downloadable_item.title: Downloadable Item
downloadable_item.description: Downloadable item that's a part or whole of the larger document

doc_type.title: Document Type
doc_type.description: The ultimate document file type when decompressed

web_url.title: Web Url
web_url.description: Web url to a downloadable artifact, compressed or not

compression_type.title: Compression Type
compression_type.description: Compression type of the downloaded artifact.
